trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Seguin
There was one other sighting in Seguin on or around March 24th 2012
Summary: OVER 30-50 SMALL ORANGE LIGHTS FLYING IN SEQ. PATTERN THEN DISS.
divs: sighting detailswe were standing outside when a lady driving by stopped and asked if i was looking at what was in the sky, i looked up and seen apx. 30-50 orange like lights moving in a sequensial path sorta moving slowlike\hovering. she stopped cause she thought she was seeing things my bro. and i seen it also this was around 8: 30-8:40 we followed and kept a eye on the objects but while looking at them they just faded right in front of us into the darkness at first i thought they were army helicopters b\c of the formation they were in, it looked similar of that.im a person who has to see to believe, and it really gave me the chills at that time going through the experience it was really crazy.
